translation.en: They don't complicate life the way people do.

translation.en: I am impressive.
I can appreciate the sentiment,
but when you get older, life isn't simple.

translation.en: - But it can be. - Sell it, my brother.
See, people are always so busy searching for a better life,

- Stop! - Make him… right there.

Let him go!
Oli!

Move!

So now,

Henry!

Henry!

A comfortably- sized house where he was sentenced for home detention.

- - I'm killing it.

Mom, Dad,
- can we go? - Can we go?
No, no.

Love, family and summer in Hawaii with my best friend?
